Article Title: Air India cancels flight operations at 8 locations for May 13, issues advisory
Article Text: NEW DELHI: Air India on Tuesday announced cancellation of two-way flight operations at eight locations, including Jammu, Leh, Jodhpur, Amritsar, Bhuj, Jamnagar, Chandigarh and Rajkot for today.This comes after Indigo also announced cancellation of its flight operations to and from Jammu, Amritsar, Chandigarh, Leh, Srinagar, and Rajkot airports for today."In view of the latest developments and keeping your safety in mind, flights to and from Jammu, Leh, Jodhpur, Amritsar, Bhuj, Jamnagar, Chandigarh and Rajkot are cancelled for Tuesday, 13th May," said Air India in a statement on X."We are monitoring the situation and will keep you updated," it added.Earlier, the airline company announced commencing flights to and from Jammu, Srinagar, Leh, Jodhpur, Amritsar, Bhuj, Jamnagar, Chandigarh and Rajkot."Following a notification from aviation authorities on the reopening of airports, Air India is working towards progressively commencing flights to and from Jammu, Srinagar, Leh, Jodhpur, Amritsar, Bhuj, Jamnagar, Chandigarh and Rajkot. We appreciate your understanding at this time as our teams work on bringing operations at these airports back to normal. Please stay tuned for further updates," Air India said.
Article Summary: Indigo also announced cancellation of its flight operations to and from jammu, amritsar, chandigarh, leh, srinagar, and rajkot airports for today. "we are monitoring the situation and will keep you updated," said air india in a statement on x.

Article Title: IAS, IPS, diplomats' bodies slam attack on Misri, his kin
Article Text:
Vikram Misri (File photo)

NEW DELHI: Several associations of civil servants , politicians and prominent citizens have come out in support of foreign secretary Vikram Misri and slammed the vicious online attack which was unleashed on the senior bureaucrat after he announced the pause in India-Pakistan hostilities on Saturday. The trolling prompted the 1989-batch Indian Foreign Service (IFS) officer to "lock" his X account. Misri's family members also faced trolling on social media.The IAS Association said it stands in solidarity with Misri and his family and reaffirmed its commitment to uphold the dignity of public service. "Unwarranted personal attacks on civil servants performing their duties with integrity are deeply regrettable," it said.In a statement, the Association of Indian Diplomats said, "This is appalling and completely unacceptable. He is an outstanding professional with an impeccable record. Strict action needs to be taken against those responsible."These are "deplorable personal attacks" and "such unwarranted assaults on civil servants committed to their duties are absolutely intolerable," Indian Police Service Association said. "We commend his unwavering service to the nation and reaffirm our resolute commitment to safeguarding the dignity of public service."Politicians cutting across party lines also came out strongly in support of Misri and his family. "It is unacceptable to target our professional diplomats and civil servants - those who work dedicatedly to serve the nation," Congress politician Sachin Pilot said.Lok Sabha MP Asaduddin Owaisi said Misri is a decent and hardworking diplomat working tirelessly for the country. "Our civil servants work under the Executive and this must be remembered and they shouldn't be blamed for the decisions taken by the Executive/or any political leadership running Watan-e-Aziz."Samajwadi Party chief Akhilesh Yadav said such incidents break the morale of honest officers, adding "some anti-social criminal elements are openly crossing all limits of abusive language against the officer and his family but neither BJP government nor any of its ministers is coming forward to protect his honour".
Article Summary: Vikram misri's family members also faced trolling on social media. The trolling prompted the 1989-batch indian foreign service (ifs) officer to "lock" his x account. The ias association said it stands in solidarity with misri and his family.

Article Title: NCW condemns 'reprehensible' abuse by trolls
Article Text:
Foreign secretary Vikram Misri

NEW DELHI: National Commission for Women Monday strongly condemned the "reprehensible" online abuse unleashed by trolls against foreign secretary Vikram Misri and his family, particularly his daughter. NCW chief Vijaya Rahatkar, in a statement, said sharing personal contact details of the secretary's daughter is a "grossly irresponsible act". "It is a serious breach of privacy that could put her safety at risk," she said. Such personal attacks on family members of the country's senior-most public servants like Misri are not only unacceptable but also morally indefensible, NCW said.The Misri family also received support from veteran diplomat Nirupama Menon Rao . "Doxxing his daughter and abusing his loved ones crosses every line of decency. This toxic hate must stop - stand united behind our diplomats, not tear them down," she said.
Article Summary: Ncw chief vijaya rahatkar said sharing personal contact details of the secretary's daughter is a "grossly irresponsible act" such personal attacks on family members of the country's senior-most public servants like misri are not only unacceptable but also morally indefensible.

Article Title: J&K Lt governor, min pay homage to BSF constable killed in Jammu
Article Text:
Jammu and Kashmir Lieutenant Governor Manoj Sinha pays tribute to the mortal remains of Border Security Force (BSF) Constable Deepak Chingakham (ANI photo)

JAMMU/GUWAHATI: Jammu and Kashmir Lieutenant Governor Manoj Sinha and minister Satish Sharma, at a wreath-laying ceremony on Monday, paid tributes to BSF constable Deepak Chingakham (25), who succumbed the day before to injuries sustained in cross-border firing by Pakistan while on duty at the international border in Jammu‚Äôs RS Pura sector on May 10.‚ÄúI salute the brave son of Mother India, BSF constable Deepak Chingakham, who made the supreme sacrifice in the line of duty. We share the grief of the family and stand in solidarity,‚Äù LG Sinha said at the ceremony organised at Shahid Smarak, BSF Frontier HQ in Paloura Camp, Jammu.‚ÄúWe are proud of his sacrifice. He joined the BSF in April 2021 and was the family‚Äôs sole breadwinner. Due to health issues, I am unable to work,‚Äù the martyr‚Äôs father, Chingakham Bonibihari Singh, told PTI. ‚ÄúHe would call me now and then to ask what I needed. He always told me to work hard to succeed in life. Now he is gone. I am completely devastated,‚Äù said Deepak‚Äôs younger brother Chingakham Naoba Singh.BSF IG (Jammu Frontier) Shashank Anand and other senior officials of BSF, police and civil departments also paid floral tributes to the slain constable at Jammu. ‚ÄúOur nation stands indebted to these brave hearts whose courage and dedication safeguard our borders. Their sacrifices will always be remembered and serve as a beacon of inspiration for generations to come,‚Äù J&K minister Satish Sharma said.Chingakham‚Äôs mortal remains ‚Äî wrapped in the tricolour ‚Äî were later dispatched to his native place in Manipur and will arrive in Imphal on Tuesday. Following a wreath-laying ceremony at Imphal airport, his remains would be taken to his hometown in Yairipok Yambem Mathak Leikai in Imphal East, where the last rites would be performed.Former chief minister of Manipur, N Biren Singh, posted on X, ‚ÄúHe was a proud son of Manipur, and as a Manipuri-Meitei, his courage and devotion to the nation reflect the unwavering commitment of our people to protect and serve. We salute the armed forces for their relentless dedication and bravery. We stand with the family of Constable Deepak in this difficult time and will extend all possible support. His sacrifice will always be remembered with honour and pride.‚ÄùBJP and Congress in Manipur also condoled the death of Chingakham.(with PTI inputs)
Article Summary: Jammu and kashmir lieutenant governor manoj sinha and minister satish sharma paid tributes to bsf constable deepak chingakham (25) he succumbed the day before to injuries sustained in cross-border firing by pakistan while on duty at the international border in jammu‚Äôs rs pura sector on may 10.

Article Title: Kashmiri hoteliers want PM Modi to appeal tourists to visit Valley
Article Text:
PM Modi (File photo)

SRINAGAR: With the tourism sector in Kashmir hit hard by the Pahalgam terror attack, hoteliers and other stakeholders have sought the intervention of Prime Minister Narendra Modi , and also plan to reach out to policymakers and influencers.Tourists had cancelled their bookings in Kashmir in large numbers following the massacre of 26 people at Pahalgam‚Äôs Baisaran valley on April 22.Mushtaq Chaya, chairman of J&K Hoteliers Club, on Monday said in Srinagar that PM Modi‚Äôs voice is most important to bring life again to the tourism sector in Kashmir Valley. He said tourist associations will seek an appointment with the PM, and will request him to appeal to the countrymen to visit the Valley.He also welcomed the ceasefire between India and Pakistan, calling it a wise decision. Expressing hope of resumption of flights to Srinagar soon, he said this will ensure tourism flow. He made a fervent appeal to tourists from across the country to visit Kashmir, saying the situation has now stabilised and they should experience the beauty and hospitality of the Valley once again.Chaya further said that hoteliers in J&K will be inviting prominent YouTubers, influencers, writers and policy makers across the country, and will ask them to post their views and reviews. He said social media influencers have played a positive role, and will be given special facilities to project Kashmir.The hoteliers will also meet J&K LG Manoj Sinha and chief minister Omar Abdullah, and will urge them to announce special packages for tourists and take steps to restore their confidence, Chaya said.On a travel advisory issued by the US on May 7, asking its citizens to avoid visiting J&K, Chaya asserted that domestic tourists were ‚Äúmore than enough‚Äù.Kashmir had seen a huge surge in tourism last year, with nearly 35 lakh people visiting the UT, including 5.11 lakh Amarnath pilgrims. The relative peace in the past few years has seen huge investment in the tourism economy, especially in the construction of guest houses and hotels, with locals in even remote areas converting their homes into home stays and tourist facilities.Chaya said 30 lakh Kashmiris are at present involved directly in the tourism sector, and 3 lakh of them are directly working in hotels and other tourism related businesses. He said the hotels have not removed any employee, and are hopeful that tourists will return to Kashmir.
Article Summary: Tourists had cancelled their bookings in kashmir in large numbers following the massacre of 26 people at pahalgam‚Äôs baisaran valley on april 22. Hoteliers in j&k will be inviting prominent youtubers, influencers, writers and policy makers across the country.

Article Title: Cash disappearance: Justice Varma‚Äôs personal secretary, staff suspected
Article Text:
Justice Varma (File photo)

NEW DELHI: A high-level judicial panel, inquiring into the discovery of a huge amount of cash at the official residence of HC judge Yashwant Varma on March 14 night, in its report to CJI Sanjiv Khanna has suspected the judge‚Äôs personal staff for the mysterious disappearance of the cash.The inquiry panel comprising Punjab and Haryana chief justice Sheel Nagu, Himachal Pradesh CJ G S Sandhawalia and Karnataka HC‚Äôs Justice Anu Sivaraman recorded the statements of the judge‚Äôs private secretary and staff, security personnel posted at his residence as well as fire and police personnel on the fire incident at the Tughlaq Crescent bungalow, the official residence of then Delhi HC judge Varma.All personnel among the first responders were unequivocal that they made videos of burning cash as well as sacks of cash untouched by the leaping flames of the fire that broke out at the storeroom within the judge‚Äôs residential premises and left the place without seizing any of the cash, either burnt or unburnt.Delhi HC Chief Justice D K Upadhyay, on being informed about the incident by the Delhi Police commissioner at 4.50pm on March 15, had instructed his registrar-cum-secretary to visit Justice Varma‚Äôs residence and inspect the place of fire. On reaching the residence, he was taken to Justice Varma by the latter‚Äôs private secretary.Justice Varma took the CJ‚Äôs secretary to the room, which was adjacent to the judge‚Äôs official residence. He found that though burnt articles and debris were in the room, there was no sign of any cash, burnt or unburnt.The inquiry panel recorded that the fire service was alerted by police, who got the first call about the incident at the judge‚Äôs residence at 11.35pm on March 14.They reached the spot at 11.43pm, doused the fire and left the scene at 1.56am on March 15. The panel also found that shortly thereafter police personnel, who videographed the incident, also left the house, leaving behind the cash as it were in the room. Security personnel posted at the judge‚Äôs residence informed the panel that Justice Varma‚Äôs private secretary and personal staff stayed back. The panel said it is prima facie of the opinion that the cash disappeared from the room in the early hours of March 15 and that the fire scene was cleared of all burnt and unburnt notes, which could not have been done without the knowledge and involvement of the judge‚Äôs private secretary and personal staff.However, the panel said it would require a formal investigation to summon witnesses and record their statements, which cannot be done by the informal inquiry panel as it had not been conferred with powers to probe as per the criminal procedure code. It is to be seen whether Delhi HC initiates any disciplinary proceedings against the judge‚Äôs private secretary based on the inquiry panel‚Äôs prima facie findings.CJI Khanna had forwarded the inquiry report to Justice Varma seeking his response and with a suggestion that he should quit judgeship. Justice Varma refused to quit, forcing the CJI to send the inquiry report along with the judge‚Äôs response to the President and the PM for formal initiation of a removal motion against him.Justice Varma was repatriated from Delhi HC to Allahabad HC, his parent high court, immediately after the constitution of the inquiry panel and has been stripped of judicial work.
Article Summary: A high-level judicial panel, inquiring into the discovery of a huge amount of cash at the official residence of hc judge yashwant varma on march 14 night, has suspected the judge‚Äôs personal staff for the mysterious disappearance of the cash.

Article Title: ‚ÄúBlake has been exploiting her name‚Äù: Taylor Swift calls out Blake Lively‚Äôs betrayal and shuts down breakup rumors with Travis Kelce in bold public comeback
Article Text: Taylor Swift made a public appearance with Travis Kelce on Mother's Day, dispelling rumors of a split as they celebrated with his family in Philadelphia. This appearance follows controversy as Swift was subpoenaed in a legal dispute involving Blake Lively and Justin Baldoni related to the 'It Ends With Us' film.
Article Summary: Taylor swift made a public appearance with travis kelce on mother's day, dispelling rumors of a split. This appearance follows controversy as swift was subpoenaed in a legal dispute involving blake lively and justin baldoni related to the 'it ends with us' film.

Article Title: LeBron James' wife Savannah James shares an adorable family picture on Mother‚Äôs Day, remembers her mom
Article Text:
LeBron James‚Äô wife Savannah James shares an adorable family picture on Mother‚Äôs Day, remembers her mom (Image Source: Savannah/Instagram)

LeBron James‚Äô wife Savannah enjoyed Mother‚Äôs Day with family and shared a group picture from celebrations

Poll Which picture do you find more touching? Savannah's family picture on Mother's Day Savannah's childhood picture with her mom

Savannah remembered her mother and expressed love for her by sharing a throwback picture on Mother‚Äôs day

LeBron James‚Äô wife, Savannah, took to her Instagram story to share how she got pampered by her family on Mother‚Äôs Day. Savannah shared a beautiful family picture that shows how they together celebrated Mother‚Äôs Day. Apart from sharing the family picture, she also shared a throwback picture from her childhood where her mother held her close while making her pose for an adorable picture.LeBron James and his clan were at their happiest ringing in Mother‚Äôs Day together. They spent a day together. A picture from their celebrations was shared by LeBron James‚Äô wife, Savannah, on her Instagram story. The picture featured Savannah and LeBron James with family, and had tasteful decoration in balloons and MOM in the background. Take a look at the picture:The picture also had their pet dog, depicting how closely tied they are as a family, and believe in celebrating important days like Mother‚Äôs Day together. Savannah is quite appropriately the scion of LeBron James family, and this picture is a beautiful proof of that.In another picture shared on Instagram story, Savannah took a trip down memory lane and revisited her childhood days. She posted a picture of herself in which her mother is holding her closely, while posing for the camera. The picture seems to be shot in a studio, a trend that was common in older days. Savannah captioned the picture, saying:‚ÄúSince she don‚Äôt take pictures (followed by an emoji),Love you Mom (heart emojis)‚ÄùFrom the caption, it seems that Savannah‚Äôs mother is not that much into taking pictures like her, and so, she shared the picture from her childhood days to honor her mother in her style.Savannah was born to her parents, father, J.K. Brinson, and mother, Jennifer Brinson, on August 27, 1986. J.K. Brinson is an established entrepreneur and uses his time and resources for various philanthropic causes. He also had a meaningful stint with the US Department of Veterans Affairs. Her mother, Jennifer Brinson, is a registered nurse.Savannah is the youngest of Brinson‚Äôs kids. She has two elder brothers and two elder sisters.It was not only Savannah who remembered her mother on Mother‚Äôs Day. Savannah‚Äôs son, Bryce James, also spoke his heart out and showered love on his mother on the special day. He posted a picture of himself along with his mother on his Instagram story, calling her ‚Äòmy day 1 (heart emoji)‚ÄôAlso Read: Savannah James attends Met Gala 2025 without husband LeBron James - Here‚Äôs why Mother‚Äôs Day was celebrated in style in the James family, and everyone did their bit to make the mothers in their lives feel special. Instagram story pictures show how closely knit James clan is and all value each other‚Äôs presence in their lives.
Article Summary: Lebron james‚Äô wife savannah shared an adorable family picture on mother‚Äôs day. She also shared a throwback picture from her childhood where her mother held her close while making her pose for an adorable picture. Instagram story pictures show how closely knit james clan is and all value each other's presence in their lives.

Article Title: Bank Holidays in May 2025: On what days are banks closed? Check state-wise full list
Article Text: Bank Holidays May 2025: In May 2025, bank holidays will vary across Indian states, impacting banking services. Closures are scheduled for Labour Day/Maharashtra Day, Rabindranath Tagore Jayanti, Buddha Purnima, State Day, Kazi Nazrul Islam's Birthday, and Maharana Pratap Jayanti.
Article Summary: In may 2025, bank holidays will vary across indian states, impacting banking services. Closures are scheduled for labour day/mahar maharashtra day, rabindranath tagore jayanti, buddha purnima, state day, kazi nazrul islam's birthday, and maharana pratap jayanti.

Article Title: Travis Kelce's ex-girlfriend Kayla Nicole breaks silence on their split and the truth behind pet custody drama
Article Text:
Kayla Nicole reignites Travis Kelce breakup drama over dog expenses (Image via: Getty Images)

The untold truth of Kayla Nicole and Travis Kelce's breakup: Pet custody and the financial responsibility



There Were So Many RED FLAGS in Travis Kelce & Kayla Nicole's Relationship üö©

Travis Kelce fires back at pet custody claims



When the headlines were buzzing about Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift, the world almost forgot that the Kansas City Chiefs star had an entirely different romantic chapter before he became a pop culture sensation with Swift. That chapter was with Kayla Nicole , a successful sports journalist, entrepreneur, and media personality. After a five-year on-and-off relationship, Kelce and Nicole parted ways in 2022 just as his connection with Swift caught fire. But now, in her newly launched podcast, ‚ÄúThe Pre-Game with Kayla Nicole,‚Äù the media personality is revisiting the past with a candid, controversial take on her breakup, particularly her experience with the pet custody battle that followed.In a recent episode of her podcast, Nicole opened up about an issue that often gets overlooked in the aftermath of high-profile relationships, the responsibility of caring for shared pets. During her conversation with guest Nazanin Mandi, Nicole didn‚Äôt mince words when discussing her experience with her two dogs, Chauncey and Rambo, whom she shared with Kelce. According to Nicole, she‚Äôs the one who‚Äôs had to bear the full financial burden for their well-being post-breakup.‚ÄúI have dogs with the previous partner, and I got both the dog‚Äôs responsibility on me,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúI had a dog bill the other day; it was $2,000.‚Äù That‚Äôs a hefty price for the care of beloved pets, and one that Kelce seemingly hasn‚Äôt shared, despite his wealth and status. This revelation comes after previous whispers about Kelce‚Äôs reluctance to contribute financially during their relationship, especially when it came to their dogs‚Äô vet care.But Kelce himself, known for his brash humor and confidence, has disputed these claims. In 2023, on The Pivot Podcast, Kelce fired back at allegations that he was ‚Äútoo cheap‚Äù to help with their pets‚Äô expenses. ‚ÄúHow crazy is that?‚Äù he said, dismissing the rumors as nonsense. He clarified that while he may not have financially supported Nicole in the way some people might expect, he certainly contributed in other ways. ‚ÄúYou got to be crazy, if you think I've never helped or gave her a couple dollars to grab some food,‚Äù he explained.So, what‚Äôs the truth? Does Kelce, one of the NFL‚Äôs highest-paid players, truly live up to his generous persona, or has Nicole been left holding the bag when it comes to taking care of the dogs they once shared? While Kelce denies the claims, Nicole‚Äôs statement paints a different picture, raising questions about the responsibility of pet ownership post-relationship, especially when there‚Äôs money and fame involved.Also Read: Micah Parsons reacts to underdog label before Cowboys vs Eagles opener At the end of the day,when love fades, the complexities of shared responsibilities don‚Äôt disappear. And for Kayla Nicole, the true cost of their split seems to be more than just emotional.
Article Summary: Kayla nicole reignites travis kelce breakup drama over dog expenses. According to nicole, she's the one who‚Äôs had to bear the full financial burden for their well-being post-breakup. This revelation comes after previous whispers about kelce's reluctance to contribute financially during their relationship.

Article Title: Ayesha Curry reflects on ‚Äúso many emotions‚Äù as she and Stephen Curry celebrate son Caius‚Äô first birthday, see photos
Article Text:
Image credit: Ayesha Curry/Instagram

Ayesha Curry pens note on Caius‚Äô first birthday

Stephen Curry and wife Ayesha Curry ‚Äôs youngest child, Caius Chai , turned one on Mother‚Äôs Day . On the occasion, Ayesha shared beautiful moments of the kid in an adorable birthday post, and fans are in love with his eyes. Lovingly called Cai Cai, the kid is loved by fans of the couple, who showered him with love on social media. The couple have four kids together: daughters Riley, 12, Ryan, 9, and sons Cannon, 6, and Caius, 1.Golden State Warriors star Stephen Curry is currently spending time with his family and four kids. He was also present to celebrate Mother‚Äôs Day along with Ayesha and their kids, and the birthday of their son Caius on the same day. Taking to Instagram, Ayesha shared a ton of pictures of Cai Cai on his first birthday and wrote, ‚ÄúOur baby boy turned ONE today! Cai cai, the sweetest boy. I can't believe it's been a year. Bursting from the seams with love for him. This was a very nuanced day. I've had so many emotions.‚ÄùWhile there were several solo pictures of the kid with a bright smile and even brighter eyes, one picture showed him sitting on the shoulders of his daddy, Stephen Curry. Aunt and actor Lindsay Lohan wished the kid in the comments section, writing, ‚ÄúHappy Birthday Cai Cai!!!!‚Äù A fan wrote, ‚ÄúHoly Cow those eyes..!!! Children are a gift from God.. Gods blessings‚Ä¶‚Äù Another gushed, ‚ÄúThose eyes!!!‚Äù Actor-comedian Yvonne Orji wrote, ‚ÄúAwwwww he‚Äôs adorable and happy Mother‚Äôs Day.‚ÄùCaius was born slightly early from the due date. The couple had announced the arrival of the child with a monochrome picture of his hand along with the caption: ‚ÄúOur sweet baby boy decided to make an early arrival!! He‚Äôs doing great and we are finally settling in at home as a family of 6! So grateful! Caius Chai 5/11/24.‚ÄùAlso Read: Stephen Curry shares lovely family photos, honors wife Ayesha Curry in emotional Mother‚Äôs Day post for her: ‚ÄúHolding down the fort while I‚Äôm gone‚Äù Stephen Curry is currently on a break to recover from his hamstring injury. He has been unable to play for the Golden State Warriors in the Western Conference semi-finals of the NBA playoffs. The team recently lost Game 3, but there are many more games against the Minnesota Timberwolves to come.
Article Summary: Stephen curry and wife ayesha curry‚Äôs youngest child, caius chai, turned one. The couple have four kids together: daughters riley, 12, ryan, 9, and sons cannon, 6, and caius, 1. Stephen curry is currently on a break to recover from his hamstring injury.

Article Title: At least 10 dead after consuming spurious liquor in Amritsar's Majitha block
Article Text: At least 10 dead after consuming spurious liquor in Amritsar's Majitha block

Article Title: Indian student Priya Saxena whom US wants to deport receives two degrees. People call it the 'ultimate revenge'
Article Text:
Indian student Priya Saxena, on US deportation list, receives two degrees. (Photo: South Dakota Searchlight)

Priya Saxena vs Kristi Noem







28-year-old doctoral student from India Priya Saxena received two degrees from South Dakota School of Mines & Technology -- a doctorate in chemical and biological engineering and a master's degree in chemical engineering. Since last month, Saxena has been on the deportation list of the homeland security department though she did not take part in any campus protests. Saxena came to the news as she sued the department and its head Kristi Noem.In 2021, Sazena was convicted for failing to move over for flashing yellow lights. Citing this incident, the DHS said her student visa should be revoked though her visa is not scheduled to expire until 2027.Saxena's graduation ceremony in which she was conferred with the title 'Dr' was called the ultimate revenge because Kristo Noem, too, received an honorary degree from Dakota itself, but there were no cheers for her, unlike Dr Saxena. Instead, she faced protests when she accepted the degree on stage in South Dakota.Saxena and her attorney Jim Leach sued Kristi Noem and won a temporary restraining order until Saxena's graduation.Her attorney argued in court that she did not commit a deportable offence. They also said that Priya declared the misdemeanor charge before applying for her next visa. Her next hearing is tomorrow.Kristi Noem was conferred with an honorary doctorate in public service by Dakota State University which is Noem' alma mater. Noem studied political science at this university. A vote was held to decide whether Noem should be given an honorary doctorate. The student senate and the general faculty voted against it claiming that it would be a highly politicized action that would antagonize international students as Noem's DHS has been cracking down on international students.But the university spokesperson said the decision was taken in favor as Noem is still the Governor of South Dakota and she has supported the university all along.
Article Summary: Indian student priya saxena, on us deportation list, receives two degrees.saxena's graduation ceremony in which she was conferred with the title 'dr' was called the ultimate revenge because kristo noem, too, received an honorary degree from dakota itself.

Article Title: Two policemen killed in suicide blast in Pak's Khyber Pakhtunkhwa
Article Text: In a tragic incident in Peshawar, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, a suicide bomber targeted a police mobile van, resulting in the death of two policemen, including a sub-inspector, and injuries to three others. The attack occurred near the cattle market on the ring road, prompting condemnation from Chief Minister Ali Amin Gandapur, who vowed that such acts would not demoralize the police.
Article Summary: A suicide bomber targeted a police mobile van, resulting in the death of two policemen, including a sub-inspector. Chief minister ali amin gandapur vowed that such acts would not demoralize the police. The attack occurred near the cattle market on the ring road.

Article Title: Passenger bus skids off a cliff in Sri Lanka, killing 21 people and injuring at least 14 others
Article Text:
Passenger bus skids off a cliff in Sri Lanka (AP)

Poll Do you believe that better driver training could reduce bus accidents? Yes No





COLOMBO: A passenger bus skidded off a cliff in Sri Lanka's tea-growing hill country on Sunday, killing 21 people and injuring at least 14 others, an official said.The accident occurred in the early hours of Sunday near the town of Kotmale, about 140 kilometers (86 miles) east of Colombo, the capital, in a mountainous area of central Sri Lanka, police said.Deputy Minister of Transport and Highways Prasanna Gunasena told the media that 21 people died in the accident and 14 others are being treated in hospitals.Local television showed the bus lying overturned at the bottom of a precipice while workers and others helped remove injured people from the rubble.The driver was injured and among those admitted to the hospital for treatment. At the time of the accident, nearly 50 people were traveling on the bus.The bus was operated by a state-run bus company, police said.Deadly bus accidents are common in Sri Lanka, especially in the mountainous regions, often due to reckless driving and poorly maintained and narrow roads.
Article Summary: A passenger bus skidded off a cliff in sri lanka's tea-growing hill country on sunday, killing 21 people and injuring at least 14 others. The accident occurred in the early hours of sunday near the town of kotmale, about 140 kilometers (86 miles) east of colombo, the capital.

Article Title: Prince Harry-linked charity African Parks admits to human rights abuses in Congo
Article Text: African Parks, a conservation organisation with Prince Harry as a board member, has acknowledged human rights abuses, including rape and torture, committed by park rangers in the Odzala-Kokoua National Park. An independent review confirmed systemic failures, prompting the charity to promise reforms like stronger safeguarding and support for marginalised Baka communities.
Article Summary: African parks, a conservation organisation with prince harry as a board member, has acknowledged human rights abuses, including rape and torture. An independent review confirmed systemic failures, prompting the charity to promise reforms like stronger safeguarding and support for marginalised baka communities.

Article Title: 37-year-old Indian-origin man fatally stabbed inside Lloyds Bank in Derby, England
Article Text: Gurvinder Johal, a 37-year-old Indian-origin man, was fatally stabbed inside a Lloyds bank branch in Derby on Tuesday afternoon. Haybe Cabdiraxmaan Nur, a 47-year-old Somalian man, has been charged with Johal‚Äôs murder and appeared in court. Another man initially arrested in connection with the case has been released without further action, as confirmed by authorities.
Article Summary: Gurvinder johal, 37, was fatally stabbed inside a lloyds bank branch in derby. Haybe cabdiraxmaan nur, a 47-year-old somalian man, has been charged with johal‚Äôs murder. Another man initially arrested in connection with the case has been released.

Article Title: NCLAT dismisses insolvency plea against PepsiCo India
Article Text:
Representative image

NEW DELHI: The National Company Law Appellate Tribunal ( NCLAT ) has dismissed an insolvency petition against PepsiCo India Holdings after observing that provisions of IBC cannot be turned into a debt-recovery proceeding.The appellate insolvency tribunal has upheld the earlier order passed by the Chandigarh bench of the National Company Law Tribunal (NCLT), which had rejected SNJ Synthetics's plea."The adjudicating authority (NCLT) has not committed any infirmity in not allowing the CIRP of the corporate debtor (PepsiCo) to be initiated solely on the basis of the claim of the contested and unsubstantiated interest component," said a three-member NCLAT bench.The NCLAT held that SNJ's insolvency petition, filed under Section 9 of IBC as an operational creditor was not maintainable since the principal amount of the debt claimed from PepsiCo had already been repaid and only a disputed claim for interest remained."The provisions of Insolvency & Bankruptcy Code (IBC) cannot be turned into a debt-recovery proceedings and to commend any such course of action would tantamount to pushing the corporate debtor to face the perils of corporate death instead of being rejuvenated and revived," NCLAT said in its order passed on May 7, 2025. The NCLAT direction came over a petition filed against the NCLT order.
Article Summary: The appellate insolvency tribunal has upheld the earlier order passed by the chandigarh bench of the national company law tribunal (nclt), which had rejected snj synthetics's plea. The nclat direction came over a petition filed against the nclt order.

Article Title: Credit score tips: 7 ways to improve your CIBIL score
Article Text:
Lenders typically reject applications from those with a poor credit score. (Image source: Freepik)

Strategies to boost your CIBIL score

1. Ensure timely repayment of

loan EMIs

2. Clear

credit card

dues promptly

3. Review and correct errors in your CIBIL report

4. Limit multiple credit applications

5. Consider a secured credit card

6. Maintain old credit card accounts

7. Monitor co-signed or joint loan accounts



Stay informed with the latest business news, updates on bank holidays and public holidays.





Your CIBIL score plays a critical role in determining whether your credit application gets approved or denied. A high credit score facilitates easier access to credit cards and loans, often at lower interest rates and with additional benefits. Conversely, a low CIBIL score poses significant challenges for individuals seeking urgent credit. Lenders typically reject applications from those with a poor credit score (600 or below), or approve them with higher interest rates. Improving your CIBIL score requires diligent adherence to specific strategies to enhance creditworthiness.Improving your credit score takes time and consistent effort. By following these, you can gradually enhance your CIBIL score and improve your chances of accessing credit facilities in the future.Paying your loan EMIs on time is crucial for maintaining a good credit score. Missing or delaying payments not only incurs penalties but also negatively impacts your credit score. Consider setting reminders or using Standing Instructions (SI) to automate your EMI payments and avoid any delays.Plan strategically to settle your credit card balances by the due date to avoid negative impacts on your CIBIL score. Non-payment or regular defaults can significantly lower your score. If unable to clear the full amount, at least pay the minimum due to prevent adverse reporting on your credit report .Also Check | Income Tax Slabs FY 2024-25 Explained: New Tax Regime Vs Old Tax Regime - What are the tax rates, slabs & surcharge rates? Find out Regularly check your CIBIL report for any inaccuracies that could be affecting your credit score. Errors such as incorrect personal information, account details, or overdue amounts can be disputed and corrected online through the CIBIL grievance redressal process, potentially boosting your credit score.Avoid making several credit applications within a short period, as each application triggers a hard enquiry on your credit report. Multiple enquiries can signal financial distress to lenders and lower your credit score. Research and apply to only one provider after careful consideration.If your credit history is impacted by past defaults, consider applying for a secured credit card backed by a fixed deposit. Secured cards can be easier to obtain and using them responsibly by making timely payments can help rebuild your credit score over time.Also Check | Post Office Savings Schemes Calculator: SSY, KVP, NSC, MIS, PPF, SCSS - How Much Will You Earn? Be A Crorepati With This Tax-Free Option - Top Points Keep older credit card accounts open, even if you no longer use them actively. Longer credit histories and consistent repayment records can positively influence your creditworthiness and support future credit applications.If you've co-signed or guaranteed a loan, monitor its repayment status regularly. Any defaults or delays in payments can affect both the borrower's and co-signer's credit scores. Communicate with the borrower to ensure timely repayments.
Article Summary: Your cibil score plays a critical role in determining whether your credit application gets approved or denied. A high credit score facilitates easier access to credit cards and loans, often at lower interest rates. Lenders typically reject applications from those with a poor credit score (600 or below)
